description: We offer two automated payment services - Auto Pay and Fleet Auto Pay.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We offer two automated payment services - Auto Pay and Fleet Auto Pay."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Which one you choose depends on the number of vehicles you or your business usually drive within the Congestion Charge zone and Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ).

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Add up to 5 vehicles to your service","Pay the daily charge by direct debit or monthly payments from a credit or debit card","Include up to 5 account users to help you manage your Auto Pay service"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Add an unlimited number of vehicles to the service","Pay the daily charge by direct debit","Include up to 5 additional account users to help you manage your Auto Pay service","Register vehicles in bulk or one by one"]}
